MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA16 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Angus Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out fault finding investigations and additional resources have arrived on site to assist further, and we now expect your supply to be restored by 1.00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:57 PM on Sunday, 20 December 2020
